titleStmt.title: A warning to the priests, magistrates, rulers, and inhabitants of Exon. thay they may forsake the wrath at hand, with none of the effects of the priests ministery in Devonshire, whose fruits have exceeded many, and are now brought to light, that the simple may return from them (who profit not) unto Christ the light, who teacheth all to profit, and is come to teach.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
